item.description:
This month's movie is Nana. Nana is a story about two women with the same first name who become friends. Nana Osaki is played by Nakashima Mika , a famous J-Pop star known for never smiling (kakkoi!). Nana Komatsu is played by Miyazaki Aoi, who recently was the leading lady in the South Korean film Virgin Snow (http://en.wikipedia.o... [English] ).

Nakashima Mika:
http://www.mikanakash... [Japanese]
http://en.wikipedia.o... [English]

Miyazaki Aoi:
http://www.aoimiyazak... [Japanese]
http://en.wikipedia.o... [English]

Movie links:
http://www.imdb.com/t... [English]
http://www.rottentoma... [English]
http://www.cinematopi... [Japanese]
http://ja.wikipedia.o... [Japanese]

Because this event takes place in a private residence, please attend one other event before coming to a movie night. Please RSVP as there is limited space. If the meeting is full and you wish to attended, please contact Pauline.

Directions to Rob and Will's apartment by T:

1) Please take the Red Line Outbound train toward BRAINTREE (not Ashmont)
2) Get off at N. Quincy Station
3) When exiting the train, turn right, walk through the metal/glass doors, and through the ticket gates.
4) Turn left and walk out the exit doors
5) Turn right, and walk toward the road (West Squantum St).
6) Cross the Street onto Holmes St (there's a crosswalk, but BE CAREFUL of traffic!!!).
7) Take a left on Moscow St
8) Take a slight right onto Hancock Street. You will have a 711 right next to you.
9) At the yellow blinking light, cross the street onto Glover Ave.
10) Take a right onto Felton St.
11) Enter the apartment on the right. The house has an outside porch, a white metal railing, and a black mailbox right in front. The porch light on as well.

Here's a visual map from the T Station to Rob & Will's Apartment:
http://web.mit.edu/~r...

Directions by Car:

Going I-93 SOUTH (SOUTH SOUTH SOUTH)

Take exit 12 toward Neponset/Quincy/RT-3A S
Merge onto Gallivan Blvd/RT-203 E
Continue to follow Gallivan Blvd
Slight right at Neponset Ave/RT-3A S
Continue on Neponset Bridge
Continue straight onto Hancock St
Turn left at Glover Ave
Turn right at Felton St

Going I-93 NORTH (NORTH NORTH NORTH)

Take exit 9 toward N Quincy/Milton/Adams St
Merge onto Willard St
Continue on Granite Ave
Turn right at Adams St
Turn left at Beale St
Turn left at Hancock St/RT-3A
Turn right at Glover Ave
Turn right at Felton St
item.name: Movie Night! Eiga no yoru!
